name: Take me Home Lite
description:
Very popular, more than 1 million users' favorite physics game, now come for apple app store.

Excellent physics puzzle game with speical level design!

"Excellent physics puzzle game. Nice graphics, level design and coin system make the game fun and great replay value. Highly recommend it!" -- by puzsite review

if you like angry birds these kinds of physics games, you'll enjoy Take me Home more!

Take me Home is a physics puzzle game. Your mission to bring Bubu (the little guy) back home in the forest. There are many friends are waiting on his way home --- but watch out, not everyone is nice to Bubu. It's your time to design smart and safe routes. Put accelrators on the proper places, and send Bubu safely at right time point!

Don't forget to collect coins on the adventure too.

*******************************************************
Some comments of Take me Home:

SAJID (2011/7/20)
I'm very picky but this Very different from others and addictive. Played for 6hrs and don't know where time goes.

Kim (2011/7/18)
Super fun!! Good time killer. Some of the levels are pretty hard though

Craig (2011/7/17)
Pretty good game for keeping you interested. Good during lunch time at the office. No problems with it what so ever....Droidx

*******************************************************
Please email to feedback@droidhang.com if any suggestions or problems.

Good luck to take Bubu home!
